alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Otsego; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 9:08PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OTSEGO...CHENANGO... CORTLAND...MADISON...TIOGA...AND BROOME COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 908 PM EDT, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from Cuyler to Nanticoke and moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Norwich, Hamilton, Sidney, Guilford, Plymouth, North Norwich, Nanticoke, Coventry, Greene and Oxford. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 9. Interstate 88 between 7 and 8. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Otsego; Tioga
